DEQ Water Quality Automated Assessment User Manual Chapter 1 Introduction

DEQ Water Quality Automated Assessment User Manual Emma Jones and Kristen Bretz 2022-06-30 Chapter 1 Introduction This manual serves as a companion document to DEQs Water Quality Assessment (WQA) automated assessment methodology.

1.1 Acknowledgements Many WQA and Water Quality Standards (WQA) staff have contributed to this effort: Kristen Bretz (kristen.bretz@deq.virginia.gov) Jason Hill (jason.hill@deq.virginia.gov) Sandy Mueller (sandra.mueller@deq.virginia.gov) Cleo Baker (cleo.baker@deq.virginia.gov) Amanda Shaver (amanda.shaver@deq.virginia.gov) Tish Robertson (tish.robertson@deq.virginia.gov) Paula Main (paula.main@deq.virginia.gov) Mary Dail (mary.dail@deq.virginia.gov) Martha Chapman (martha.chapman@deq.virginia.gov) Sara Jordan (sara.jordan@deq.virginia.gov) Kristie Britt (kristie.britt@deq.virginia.gov) Jennifer Palmore (jennifer.palmore@deq.virginia.gov) Kelley West (kelley.west@deq.virginia.gov) Rebecca Shoemaker (rebecca.shoemaker@deq.virginia.gov) Please direct any questions to the project lead programmer, Emma Jones (emma.jones@deq.virginia.gov).
